Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16191111/F/t 800 1600/e M: ragtime/-1000 -1000/farmer 3 10 2 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 14 6 2/addConversationTopic BearFamBeeBonuses 7/setSkipActions AddMail current BeeExplanationSkipped tomorrow/skippable/playSound stairsdown/advancedMove farmer false 3 0 0 1 6 0 0 -1 5 0 0 -1 4 10/pause 1000/viewport 12 10/globalFadeToClear/playSound MadDog.HashtagBearFam_BeeNoise/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 40/pause 500/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd false 2 0 2 10/pause 1000/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 40/pause 1000/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd false 0 -2 1 0 2 10/pause 1000/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28/pause 1000/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd false 1 0 0 2 1 0 2 10/pause 1000/waitForAllStationary/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Hah?"/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/quickQuestion #Are you actually beekeeping the bees?#Are you harvesting their honey?(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Hello to you too, @.$12#$b#Well, they're pretty much self-sustaining. I just fake it and they tolerate me.$12#$b#They're a little more lively on Sundays when I come down to harvest the Fersken honey, though.$3"\emote farmer 16(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Naw, just harrassin' them.$3#$b#I only harvest the honey on Sundays because that's about how often they produce anything useable from the Fersken tree.$12"\emote farmer 32/pause 1000/quickQuestion #What happens when the Fersken tree is out of season?#Can I have some honey?(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Then they just feed off the wildflowers we have around.$12#$b#It's such a bother though, they make honey way faster then meanin' I have to come down here every four days.$14#$b#Like I don't already have enough to do.$14"(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Sure? Stop by on any Sunday and take whatever's left.$12#$b#Oh but come Fall they're feeding off wildflowers, so they make honey more often.$3#$b#It's a pain because I have to jar it more often, practically every four days...What a bother.$14"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Anyway, here have a sample, on the hive.$3"/addItem (O)MadDog.HashtagBearfam.FerskenPeach_Honey 1 0/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "You can now take the honey Sig doesn't jar every Sunday in Spring and Summer, and every four days in Fall, free of charge from the Lodge cellar!"/end

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16191004/F/d Fri/e MadDog: Saloon1/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 15 20 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 20 17 2 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 21 17 2 Gus 15 18 2/addConversationTopic SigtheSoldier 5/skippable/positionOffset MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 0 -7/showFrame MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 37/animate MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren true true 800 54 54 54 58 58 58 59 59 59 58 58 58 54 54 54 54 54 54/animate MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd false true 700 84 84 84 85 85 85 86 86 86 85 85 85 84 84 84 84 84 84/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 16 21/pause 1000/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "So you probably know why else I'm here."/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Anxiety, I presumed.$9"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 28/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.56 true/emote Gus 32/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Man's got jokes, everybody.$17#$b#Actually, if you ever bothered to open any mail from the FRA, you'd know why -"/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I don't care."/playSound doorclose/warp farmer 14 24/advancedMove farmer false 0 -3 -2 0 0 -1 -2 0 4 10/advancedMove Gus false -5 0 2 10/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "- I was selected to get up to speed on the award ceremony.$17"/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I still don't care."/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 28/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "-And I'll be the one pinning you, unless you REALLY want ol' Colonel Udina to do it -$17"/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I don't want the medal.$5"/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Good news, you're getting two -"/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Why two? Just because I didn't die? That's ridiculous.$5"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 8/pause 500/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra false 0 1 6 0 0 -2 4 10/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Sig. Getting to come home isn't a crime and you have to stop viewing it like that.$2#$b#And you know damn well you were up for accollades before - "/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I don't want the medals. It's - not right, Teren.$5"/pause 600/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "I think the idea of a medal ceremony is quite lovely, Sigurd darling. We could throw a party.$3"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 32/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 36/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "And let the whole town into the Lodge? Pass.$11"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 60/advancedMove farmer false 2 0 0 1 8 0 0 -3 4 10/advancedMove Gus false 8 0 1 10/pause 1000/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "You know if Colonel gets involved he'd demand a parade.$17"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 56 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 36/pause 500/speak Gus "In lieu of a parade, you could have the ceremony here at the Saloon.$1"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 56 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 16 true/emote farmer 16 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 36/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh, Sigurd, that does sound lovely. Plenty of folks around here like you, they'd love to celeberate your achievement-$1"/jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 12/paus 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Absolutely not. There's nothing to celebrate.$5"/stopAnimation MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 0/stopAnimation MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 0/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 8/pause 500/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd false 0 1 1 0 0 3 -8 0 0 3 2 10/pause 1000/faceDirection MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 2/faceDirection Gus 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Sigurd! We'll need to plan this eventually!"/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Plan it with the dead, they earned those medals more than I ever did.$5"/pause 1000/emote farmer 28 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 28 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 28 true/emote Gus 28/pause 500/warp MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd -100 -100/playSound doorclose/pause 100/quickQuestion #I'm confused, why is Sig getting medals?#This whole thing made Sig really mad.(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 40\pause 400\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Because he was a damn good soldier. Spent a lot of effort to learn about Gotoro customs and languages, became a real asset when it came to negotiations.$17"\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "He was by all accounts I've heard an excellent soldier, until the accident...$2"\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "The accident took a lot from us. Good friends, Sig's career...$2"\emote Gus 60 true\emote farmer 60(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 28\pause 400\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Ever since the Army doctors determined he was unfit for service, Sig's been upset.$2"\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "My dear nephew really had his heart set on being a career soldier... He genuinely loved being in Gotoro, spoke the language, partook in the culture norms there...$2"\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "But when the road collapsed under us... well, things changed a lot. And Sig's been understandably upset ever since.$2"\emote Gus 60 true\emote farmer 60/pause 1000/quickQuestion #The accident was really that bad?#I don't think you'll be able to give him his medals.(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "It was the most terrifying day of my life. I... I thought I'd lost Sig that day.$2#$b#I... I lost a lot of people, but somehow me and Big Bear survived.$2"\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "And I'm grateful every day that you two did.$2"\emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 20 true\emote Gus 20 true\emote farmer 20(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Y'know @, I'm afraid you might be right. Big Bear and I went through a lot that day, but he's... he's still carrying the weight of it.$2"\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "I'll never stop being grateful you two came home, but my dear nephew still hurts from it all...$2"\emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 60 true\emote Gus 60 true\emote farmer 60/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Life can change in an instant but those changes have lasting effects sometimes. This seems to be one of those cases."/end

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16191006/e MadDog.BearFam: MadDog.HashtagBearFam_TheBearFamilyDen/-1000 -1000/farmer 10 14 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 14 5 2 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 16 6 3 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar 15 7 0 Harvey 16 6 0/skippable/addConversationTopic SigRecovery 5/showFrame MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 31/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 16 8/doAction 10 13/advancedMove farmer false 0 -7 4 0 4 10/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Glad to see you conscious again. How's your head?"/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "...Never received any complaints.$18"/textAboveHead Harvey "Sigurd."/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar "Sig!"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 28/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Were you hurt, Gun?$8"/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar "I mean, I think I pulled something dragging your gigantic carcass out of there but I -$6"/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "-Saved my life. Gunnar the hero.$18"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar 60/pause 400/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar "Don't bully me. I was really scared!$7"/emote farmer 32/pause 400/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Wow, I can't believe both Bears are just natural born heroes.#$b#Some families just get all the luck.$1"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 16/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Barnes. You alright, too?"/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "All clear, Big Bear."/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 32 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 32 true/emote Harvey 32 true/emote farmer 32 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar 32 true/pause 800/speak Harvey "Gunnar, do you mind stepping out here with me?#$b#I'll get you set up to take Sigurd home finally.$1"/advancedMove Harvey false -3 0 0 1 -4 0 0 3 -3 0 1 10/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar "Oh yeah, of course."/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar false 0 -1 -2 0 0 1 -4 0 0 3 -1 0 3 10/pause 1000/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "So what happened?"/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Well, you did really well in the 'rescue Gunnar' part of cave exploration... But the second adventure down there was a clear mistake.$17"/emote farmer 40 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 40/pause 500/{{MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SigurdHospitalEli}}/pause 1250/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Barnes.$8"/shake MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 1500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "The ceiling collapsed above you. It was the second time I've had to watch as someone dug yout out of a pile of rubble.$2"/emote farmer 60 true/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "'m sorry."/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 36/pause 400/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "...I *hate* caves."/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Hey, me too! We gotta stop hanging out in 'em.$1"/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "...I suppose you have a suggestion of where we can hang out instead?$18"/emote farmer 8/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Read me like an open book. Come to the next veterans' therapy session with me.#$b#We'll make it a whole boys day.$1"/emote farmer 16 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 40/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Come on, Big Bear. You've already proven you can handle going into caves when they *don't* fight back.#$b#Now you just gotta face a therapist and win."/emote farmer 28 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "First off, that sounds like I'm going to fight a therapist. Second off, I'm not *afraid* of therapist -"/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Then you'll come with me! Perfect! I'll call and get us in on the next one.$1"/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren false 0 2 -3 0 0 1 -3 0 0 2 2 10/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Hey... @. You must be real tired of rescuing Bears."/quickQuestion #I guess you guys are an endangered species.#You're going to owe me *so* many chores now.(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Self-inflicted, at that. What does that make us, koalas?$18"(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I suppose you're right. Best draw me up a chore chart, @.$1#$b#I prefer gold star stickers, by the way.$18"/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 1000/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 32/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Thanks, @. Really appreciate you having our collective backs.$1"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Sig will be back to full strength in no time, and with friends like you, Teren, and Gunnar supporting him, maybe he'll be able to overcome more of his fears in time."/end

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16191007/e MadDog.BearFam: MadDog.HashtagBearFam_TheBearFamilyDen/-1000 -1000/farmer 22 23 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 21 11 1 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 24 11 3/addConversationTopic SigSoItBegins 10/skippable/changeToTemporaryMap BusStop/pause 10/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 26 13 clamp/advancedMove farmer false 0 -8 4 10/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "No way, not doing it."/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Heh, scaredy-cat."/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 12 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 32/pause 500/faceDirection MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 2/faceDirection MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 2/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 16 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 8/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Hey, farmer @! Glad you caught us in time!$1"/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Hey, you."/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 28 true/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Don't mind him. He's still a little punchy from the head injury.#$b#We're off to skulk at the Veterans' Hospital for a follow up exam on him, and our therapy session. Exciting stuff, huh?$1"/emote farmer 32 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 36/pause 500/quickQuestion #Are you guys going to be gone for long?#Thank you for looking after him on this trip.(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 32\pause 400\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Naw, you can't get rid of us that easily.$1#$b#We'll be back in the Valley sometime late tonight."(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 60 true\emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 60\pause 500\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Hey, you did a lot of the heavy lifting. Like, all of it, what with the falling rocks and stuff.$2#$b#So, y'know, thank *you* for having his back for me all this time.$1"/emote farmer 56/message "Now boarding for Zuzu City."/playSound busDoorOpen/pause 100/jump farmer/jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren/jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Uh oh, that's us. Alright. Happy harvestin', @!"/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren false 2 0 0 -2 4 10/pause 2200/warp MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren -100 -100/pause 10/quickQuestion #You'll be alright, Sig. See you when you come home.#Are you just going to stand there, staring at me?(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "...Yeah. Probably. Maybe. Sure hope so. See ya, @. Stay safe."(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "...Yeah? Maybe. Would really piss off you and Barnes if I did, I reckon.#$b#See ya, @. Stay safe."/emote farmer 32/pause 500/quickQuestion #You too, Sig!#You better follow your own advice now!(break)textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Isn't that what you and Gun are for?"(break)textABoveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "That's what I got you and Gun for."/pause 1000/animate MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd false false 150 72 72 73 73 72 72 73 73/pause Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16191008/e MadDog.BearFam: ragtime/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 7 31 2 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 10 33 3/addConversationTopic SigatHome 5/skippable/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 8 33/pause 400/playSound treecrack/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Nice shot, nice shot."/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 32/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun "I'm doing a *lot* better now!"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 56/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Doing great. Might even be able to take money off of Gun or Tere at this rate.$1"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 56/warp farmer 19 32/playSound doorClose/pause 200/advancedMove farmer false 0 -1 -6 0 0 -1 -4 0 0 1 2 10/pause 2000/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Hey you."/pause 500/jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun "Are you here to get lessons?"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 32/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun "Sig's teaching me how to play pool!"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 16/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun "Fiiiiiine. He's teaching me the *right* way to play pool."/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun "He's good at pool, just like everything he does.$6#$b#He could teach you too, if you needed a lesson!"/emote farmer 8 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 40/pause 500/jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Don't go volunteering me for stuff.$11"/quickQuestion #I'd like to take lessons from you one of these days, Sig.#I could totally beat him in a game of pool, no problem!(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 56\pause 500\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Eh. Don't go around tellin' people but you can bug me anytime for a lesson, @.$1"\emote farmer 56(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 56\pause 500\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Oh? Is that so? I'll take any challengers, come on then!$10"\emote farmer 32/pause 500/quickQuestion #Should I come by the Lodge to play?#It's either here or the Inn, right?(break)textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Ah, well, maybe..."(break)textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Well, I guess maybe..."/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28 true/emote farmer 28 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 28/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "We could meet up at the Saloon sometime?$8"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 8 true/emote farmer 8/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun "On a weekday, prefarably..."/jump farmer/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I could try a weekend. Or whatever. Whenever you're free.$9"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 16 true/emote farmer 16/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Yeah, yeah. Go shout it on the mountain, why don't you.$11#$b#Just... let me know whenever works for you, or whatever.$18"/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun "If it's on a Friday, let me know so we can come back from Zuzu in time!"/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Kids aren't allowed in the Saloon."/jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun "What, after 8 PM?"/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Ever. It's a new rule Gus announced.$18"/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun "You're lying!"/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "It's the truth! Right, @?$18"/jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 1000/stopAnimation farmer/jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 32 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 32 true/emote farmer 32/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Sig at the Saloon on a Friday night? You'll have to see it to believe it. But if anyone can overcome his fears, you know it's him."/end

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16191009/e MadDog.BearFam: libraryTheme/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 13 16 0 Penny 14 14 2 Alex 15 14 2 Gus 12 13 2 {{Gunther}} 9 14 2/addConversationTopic SigFuture 5/skippable/animate Alex false true 100 16 17 18 19 20 21 22 23/showFrame {{Gunther}} 4/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 15 15/pause 100/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 12/warp farmer 3 14/playSound doorClose/pause 400/advancedMove farmer false 0 -1 5 0 0 5 3 0 0 -2 4 10/pause 1000/emote Penny 40 true/emote Alex 40 true/emote Gus 40/pause 400/speak Alex "Bummer. What was the other place again?$2"/textAboveHead {{Gunther}} "Welcome!"/emote farmer 40/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 8/pause 400/speak Penny "Cattails Ranch... and they *also* want ten years of experience.$2"/emote Gus 28 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28 true/emote Alex 28/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "There's nothing out there."/pause 500/textAboveHead Penny "Don't give up that quickly, Sig!"/pause 500/speak Gus "Miss Penny's right, Sig, there's something we're missing. I just know it!"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 12/pause 400/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Hey you. We're looking for a job.$11"/textAboveHead Alex "For Sig!"/emote Penny 32/pause 500/stopAnimation Alex 0/speak Penny "I don't suppose you have any ideas, @? We'll take all the help we can get!"/quickQuestion #I thought your family was crazy wealthy, Sig?#You're kind of only good for manual labor...#What's been shot down so far?(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28\pause 500\speak Gus "Sig is wisely deciding to make sure he's self-sufficient.$1"(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 36\textAboveHead Alex "Whoa, harsh."\pause 500\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Jeez, @, you didn't have to kick me while I was down.$9"(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 60 true\emote Penny 60\pause 500\speak Penny "We're not really shooting anything down as much as nothing's quite suitable...$2"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak {{Gunther}} "The biggest hurdle is unfortunately Sergeant Bear's experience thus far.#$b#The time in the miltary was by no means a waste, but it doesn't quite provide a higher education."/quickQuestion #Oh, is that all? Just go back to school!#If you're not qualified for something, then get qualified, obviously.(break)jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd\emote Penny 16 true\emote Alex 16 true\emote Gus 16 true\emote {{Gunther}} 16(break)jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd\emote Penny 8 true\emote Alex 8 true\emote Gus 8 true\emote {{Gunther}} 8/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "But for what?"/pause 500/speak Gus "Well, you can always become a chef, Sig!#$b#It's never too late to learn the art of cooking after all!$1"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 12 true/emote farmer 16 true/emote Alex 36/pause 500/speak Alex "What, you want him to poison us all? No way!$1#$b#Become a gridball coach, Sig! At least you already do that well!$3"/emote Gus 36 true/emote farmer 16 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 40/pause 500/textAboveHead Penny "Well, actually..."/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 8 true/emote farmer 8 true/emote Alex 8 true/emote Gus 8 true/emote {{Gunther}} 8/pause 500/speak Penny "Gus has a point, in that it's *never* too late to learn something...#$b#And Alex is right in that you do enjoy coaching, after all, he's gotten way better since you two teamed up!"/emote Alex 32 true/emote Gus 32 true/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Where ya going with this one, Pen?"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Penny "You could always go back to school and become a teacher!"/jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd/jump Gus/jump Alex/jump {{Gunther}}/jump farmer/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 16 true/emote {{Gunther}} 16 true/emote Gus 16 true/emote Alex 16 true/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/quickQuestion #Well, you *were* teaching Gudrun pool the other day.#Aren't you the one who taught Gun how to fight?(break)jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd\textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Well, she's just a kid..."(break)jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd\textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Yeah but that was when we were still kids..."/pause 500/emote farmer 40/speak Penny "Well, what else would you be teaching besides kids, Sig?$1"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28 true/emote farmer 32/pause 300/speak Gus "Now there's a thought! You could even go on a vacation and leave Sig in charge, Miss Penny!$1"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28 true/emote farmer 32/pause 300/speak Alex "And you can still be a sports coach in case one of the kids shows a real knack for gridball like I did at that age!$1"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28 true/emote farmer 32/pause 300/speak {{Gunther}} "Those are all great arguments for it but... Sergeant Bear, your thoughts?"/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Me, a TEACHER!?"/pause 1000/quickQuestion #You can't tell us after everything you've been through, *children* are going to be your biggest fear?#If all of us think you can do it, then sure, why not?(break)speak Penny "I can promise you, they're not scary! Every single one of them is a sweetheart!$1"\speak Alex "I can name a dozen more things scarier than the local kids, Sig, c'mon.$1"(break)speak Gus "And our very own Miss Penny would be happy to guide you along the way, I'm sure."\speak Penny "I'd be happy to help you study so we can become coworkers in the field of education, Sig!$1"/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "...Maybe there's a way to do a trial run?$8"/textAboveHead Penny "Oh, that's brilliant!"/emote farmer 8 true/emote {{Gunther}} 8 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 8 true/emote Gus 8 true/emote Alex 8/pause 500/speak Penny "You can do a subsitute lesson! Any topic you want, and I'll help you make a lesson plan!"/quickQuestion #That's giving Sig an awful lot of freedom...#Sig, try not to come up with something boring like the history of gridball.(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28 true\emote Gus 28(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 12 true\emote Alex 12/pause 500/speak {{Gunther}} "Why not teach about bees, Sergeant? You have become quite knowledgeable on the subject."/emote Penny 32 true/emote farmer 32/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "The bees...?"/speak Gus "That's a perfect test topic, Sig!"/speak Alex "Yeah, you do know a *lot* about bees and honey, and kids like bugs.#$b#*I* liked bugs when I was a kid, at least.$1"/emote Penny 28/pause 400/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "...Alright. Okay. I guess I'll 'write up a lesson plan' or whatever... Pen, s'alright if I stop by later with whatever I come up with?"/emote Penny 20/pause 500/speak Penny "Yes, absolutely! And I'll be there for the day of the lesson, too!"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 32/pause 400/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Can I count on your attendance, @?$18"/quickQuestion #Wouldn't miss it for the world, Mr. Bear!#Oh I *gotta* see how this turns out.(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 32(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 12/emote Penny 32 true/emote Gus 32 true/emote {{Gunther}} 32 true/emote Alex 32/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Hopefully Sig's bee-based teaching session goes off without a hitch! He and Penny will send you a letter when it's time for class."/end

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16191010/e MadDog.BearFam: MadDog.HashtagBearFam_TheBearFamilyDen/-1000 -1000/farmer 17 97 2 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 25 105 2 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 26 105 2/addConversationTopic SigImprovement 7/skippable/showFrame MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 32/showFrame MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 39/positionOffset MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 0 33/positionOffset MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 0 30/hideShadow MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd true/hideShadow MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren true/advancedMove farmer false 0 9 6 0 1 10/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 25 106/pause 100/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "I'm super proud of you, Big Bear.$1"/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Oh shut it."/pause 600/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Can't bully me that easily."/pause 1200/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Oh, hey you."/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Hey @! You caught us just in time; made it back from Zuzu a few hours ago."/emote farmer 16/pause 500/quickQuestion #Did your guys' session go well?#You're still going through therapy?(break)textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Yeah I guess..."\pause 500\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "It went really well! Thanks for asking."\emote farmer 32(break)textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Was there supposed to be a finish line?"\pause 500\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "If it still helps, why stop now?"\emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "It's like... growing pains? If that makes sense.#$b#Maybe things are improving... but there are still bad days. So...#$b#%Sig trails off."/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Big Bear?"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I guess it's... *helpful*... to have a support system I can lean on.$9"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 16 true/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Yeah, yeah, I know, I can ask you two for help. Don't make a big deal out of it.$18"/emote farmer 32 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 32/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 32/pause 500/emote farmer 56 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 56 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 56/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Sig has grown a lot since he first glowered at you from behind a beehouse. He appreciates your part in his journey even if he won't say it out loud."/end

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16191011/e MadDog.BearFam: ragtime/-1000 -1000/farmer 90 89 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 93 85 2 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 93 89 0 Penny 90 84 2 Jas 91 87 0 Eloise 92 88 0 Vincent 93 87 0/addConversationTopic SigTheraBees 10/addTemporaryActor BearFamBeeHouse 16 32 92 85 2 false character/hideShadow BearFamBeeHouse true/skippable/animate MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd false true 1000 17 19/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 92 89/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Anyway, that's why pollinator gardens are really important in urban spaces like Zuzu City. Any questions?$3"/jump Vincent/speak Vincent "Is Killer Bees From Outer Space based on a true alien invasion?$2"/emote farmer 28 true/emote Penny 28/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "...No, it's not. Did your brother let you watch that?$14"/speak Jas "What kind of flowers make the best honey?$3"/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Well, 'best' is subjective and it depends on how sweet or floral you want your honey.$3#$b#Fairy roses make a valuable, sweet honey, while sunflowers can create a lighter, almost delicate flavor.$3"/emote Penny 16/pause 500/speak Eloise "Do urban cities like Zuzu plan for pollinator gardens?"/emote Penny 8 true/emote Vincent 8 true/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Not until recently. The average homeowner, like myself or someday, you, can plan to setup our home gardens so they're pollinator friendly.$12#$b#Whether we're in a city or here in the country side, every bit helps.$3"/emote Eloise 32 true/emote farmer 32 true/emote Penny 32/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun "So... is the next lesson about the birds and the bees?$6"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 12 true/emote Penny 28 true/emote Jas 8 true/emote Vincent 8 true/emote farmer 28/pause 700/textAboveHead Eloise "I can teach you about birds, Gudrun!"/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun "Great idea!"/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "And Eloise has the floor. Thanks, Professor Bird-facts.$3"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 32 true/emote Jas 32 true/emote Vincent 32 true/emote farmer 32/pause 500/advancedMove farmer false 0 -3 1 0 1 10/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd false 0 1 3 10/advancedMove Penny false 0 3 2 0 4 10/advancedMove Jas false 0 1 1 10/advancedMove Vincent false 0 1 3 10/faceDirection Eloise 2/pause 2000/speak Penny "Sig! You did wonderfully! And I *greatly* appreciate you remembering not to swear in front of the children.$1"/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 1000/stopAnimation farmer/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 1/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Hey, c'mon now, my sister's one of those children."/emote Penny 32 true/emote farmer 32/pause 500/quickQuestion #So how do you feel? You taught pretty well.#*I* knew a lot of the information already, so you're basically a teacher in my eyes.(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 16 true\emote Penny 56\pause 500\speak Penny "@ is right! You *do* already have a knack for it, so what do you think?"(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 12 true\emote Penny 60\pause 500\textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Hey, you come up here and teach 'em next time then."\pause 1000\speak Penny "Well, @'s wealth of knowledge aside, you really showed a knack for it. What do you think, Sig?"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 40/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "...I... Well, I didn't *hate* it but... It's a lot of work. I don't know how you do it, Pen.$12"/emote Penny 16 true/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Penny "Well, it is hard work but it's really rewarding, isn't it?$1#$b#That makes it easy when I think about how much I'm helping the children learn and grow.#$b#And besides, Sig - you're no stranger to hard work. Don't sell yourself short after just starting!$1"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 20 true/emote farmer 20/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Well, if the hardest working people I know - that's the two of you, for the record - think I should try...$3"/jump Penny/jump farmer/emote farmer 32/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 32/emote Penny 32/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "It sounds like Sig has made up his mind, thanks to you and Penny supporting him."/end

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16191012/e MadDog.BearFam: Saloon1/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 6 19 1 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 5 17 2 Pam 7 18 2 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 8 17 2 Gus 9 18 3/addConversationTopic SigConvosAndCraftBeer 4/skippable/globalFadeToClear 100/pause 1000/viewport 10 20/pause 200/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "C'mon, Pam, it's like the *only* good thing that developed while I was deployed, for crying out loud.$9"/pause 500/speak Pam "There's no way, Siggy!"/pause 600/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 16/pause 600/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Stop calling me that."/pause 900/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Barnes, c'mon man, speak up. Tell her the truth.$11"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 32/pause 600/speak Pam "No way! There's no point to non-alcoholic beer!$1"/pause 600/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "There's tons of microbreweries back in Zuzu that are getting crazy creative with non-alcoholic drinks.$1"/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "We should take a trip just for a brewery tour next time we head into the city.$1"/pause 100/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 32 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 32/pause 600/speak Pam "If you're gonna drink beer, make it a real beer! That's my policy.$1"/pause 600/speak Gus "Sig's right, it's a booming market.$1"/pause 600/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh, Gus, I didn't know you followed the newest trends.$1"/pause 600/emote Gus 32/pause 600/speak Gus "There's plenty of people who enjoy the vibrant atmosphere of their local Saloon but simply do not drink.#$b#Expanding my non-alcoholic offerings brings the kids like Alex and Haley in.$1"/pause 600/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "And it's *technically* healthy, too.#$b#So if Doc Harvey gets on your case like he does mine...$10"/pause 600/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Sigurd!"/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Big Bear!"/pause 800/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "What? He does. But yeah, it's healthier, it brings in a wider variety of customers. It tastes good."/pause 600/emote Pam 40/pause 600/jump Pam/pause 600/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 14 23/pause 10/advancedMove farmer false 0 -2 -2 0 0 -1 -4 0 4 10/speak Pam "Alright. Fine, we'll try your way. You and your Sergeant cobble together the best options. Gus, put in an order!$1"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 56 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 56/pause 600/emote Gus 28/pause 600/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "The Bear family would be happy to sponsor this purchase, Gus.$4"/pause 400/emote Gus 20/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Maybe we oughtta go into the city tonight, Barnes.$1"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 28/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Pam, you're gonna change your tune, mark my words.$18"/pause 500/speak Pam "We'll see about that, tough guy!"/pause 400/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd false 0 1 1 0 1 10/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 600/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Hey you. You missed most of the debate but Teren and I'll let you know when the nonalcoholic stuff arrives so you can have a round.$1"/quickQuestion #First round's on you, right?#Kind of sounds gross, but if you're buying, I'm trying.(break)textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Of course!"(break)textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Hey, don't knock it til you try it!"/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 56/pause 1000/speak Pam "Now there's an idea! Siggy! Buy my rounds, too!$1"/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Yeah, yeah, as soon as it gets in.$1"/pause 400/emote Pam 12/pause 450/speak Pam "I meant right now, kiddo.$3"/pause 400/faceDirection Pam 1/speak Gus "Better luck next time Pam.$1"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 32 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 32 true/emote farmer 32 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 32/pause 800/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Hey, @. You can ask me to buy your next round any time you want.$1"/{{MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SigurdDateQuestion}}/pause 600/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 32/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

"There's no way!"/emote Aideen 40/textAboveHead Maru "But I saw one!"/emote Nova.Dylan? 28 true/{{MadDog.HashtagBearFam.SigMotHMateo}}/emote Jasper? 16/emote Haley 12 true/emote Alex 28 true/textAboveHead Victor? "C'mon you two..."/emote PlumForrest? 32/emote Barron? 16/emote Trace? 40/emote Abigail 8/emote Rosa 36 true/emote Juliet? 52/textAboveHead Jacob "Wait your turns, everyone."/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 40/jump Vincent/emote Jas 8 true/emote Eloise 32/emote Lavril? 32 true/emote Void? 8/emote Olivia? 16/emote Andy? 36/emote Susan? 32/viewport move -1 0 4000/pause 1000/speak Penny "Everyone's having a good time, huh?"/emote farmer 32 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 32 true/emote {{Gunther}} 32 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Hanging in there?"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Yeah, yeah, I'm fine. Noisy, ain't it?$8"/quickQuestion #You're tough. You've handled louder.#You can step out at anytime, Sig.(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "@ is absolutely right, Big Bear.#$b#Remember when we flipped the truck?"\jump Penny\jump farmer\jump {{Gunther}}\emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28\pause 500\speak Penny "When you WHAT?!$3"\textAboveHead {{Gunther}} "Goodness gracious!"\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "No one was hurt! We just...#$b#Rolled it down a hilll... onto a colonel's vehicle.$9"\emote farmer 16(break)speak Penny "Definitely! Take a breather if you need one, Sig!"\speak {{Gunther}} "The event is for you, after all."\emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 8\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "So far so good. Just a whole lot of people.$8"\emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Well, you've got the medals, so it's not like anyone can say you're a coward, dummy.$3"/emote Penny 12 true/emote Gunther 28/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I know. And it... it doesn't matter. If people did think...$9"/quickQuestion #That's right! Bravery isn't measured by how much suffering you put yourself through.#You're the only one can call yourself a coward, Sig. No one else holds that power.(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "Bravery isn't even measurable, no matter how many medals they ask me to stick on you."\speak Penny "And none of us are going to let you suffer for the sake of it."(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "And if someone DOES go around callling you a coward, they can answer to me.$3"\speak Penny "And me!$5"\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren "That's quite the shiny spine you got there, Penny.$1"\speak Penny "As a teacher, you need one, as Sig is rapidly discovering.$1"\emote farmer 32 true\emote {{Gunther}} 32 true\pause 500/speak {{Gunther}} "@ makes a wonderful point, Sergeant."/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Great farmer, great advice-giver, great friend - is there anything you can't do, @?$18"/emote farmer 56 true/emote Penny 56 true/emote {{Gunther}} 56 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren 56 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 56/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "The whole town had a blast at the party and plenty of people came up to Sig to congratulate him on earning his new medals. Sig didn't step outside to smoke even once."/end

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16191014/e MadDog.BearFam: libraryTheme/-1000 -1000/MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 12 5 0 farmer 7 17 1 {{Gunther}} 3 8 2/addConversationTopic SigTeacher 4/skippable/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd false 3 0 4 800 2 0 4 600 -2 0 4 700 -3 0 4 800 3 0 4 600 2 0 4 700 -2 0 4 10/advancedMove farmer false 0 -3 5 0 0 -3 2 0 0 -5 4 10/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 14 7/pause 1500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "This looks kind of complicated..."/pause 1000/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Maybe over here?"/pause 1300/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I think Penny suggested..."/pause 1200/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 40/pause 1000/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Kind of outdated... maybe it's time to order new literature?"/pause 3000/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 16/pause 500/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd false -1 0 0 -1 2 10/pause 1000/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I didn't hear you coming, sorry, @.$8"/quickQuestion #Oh shoot, was your hearing aid turned off?#Getting unaware in your old age, huh?(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I wish I could use that as an excuse this time.$18"(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Yeah, actually. Putting together materials for class."/jump farmer/emote farmer 16/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 36/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "No, not to teach!"/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "It's for the certification classes I'm taking online, actually.$11"/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "It's been a lot of reading - which is fine#$b#I think Gudrun's tired of fixing my computer though - I dunno why it keeps shutting down, I never used it much before.$8"/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 1000/stopAnimation farmer/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 0/quickQuestion #Maybe you should take computer repair classes, too!#Just *what* have you done to the poor thing?(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28\pause 500\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "They have clases for ANYthing nowadays, don't they?$8"(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 12\pause 500\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "You sound like Gudrun. I *don't* use the stupid thing, it just never works.$9"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "...Hey @? I've been meaning to say... thanks.$1"/emote farmer 8 pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Yeah, yeah, yeah. Enjoy it while it lasts, y'know my base nature is naturally grumpy.$18"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I won't be able to help out at the farm if I become a teacher, y'know."/pause 1000/emote farmer 12/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "*Heh.*"/emote farmer 36/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "I'm not laughing at you! *Heh*."/emote farmer 12/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "For real... *thank you*."/pause 700/emote farmer 56/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 56/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Sure you've got time for this? We can always reschedule if you're needed back at %farm.$1"/quickQuestion #Nope, cleared my whole day for this.#Actually...(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 20\pause 400\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Well aren't I special?$4"\emote farmer 32(break)emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 28\pause 400\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Aw, really? Well, can't be helped I reckon... Maybe next time?"\emote farmer 28\pause 200\globalFade\viewport -1000 -1000\end/pause 400/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "Well, the movie's about to roll soon, should we go find our seats?$1"/quickQuestion #Yeah, I can't wait!#You never did tell me what kind of movie this was...(break)textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "This will be great!"\emote farmer 32(break)textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd "It's a surprise."\emote farmer 28/pause 500/advancedMove farmer false -3 0 0 -3 4 10/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd false -2 0 0 -2 4 10/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation MovieTheaterScreen/warp farmer 8 9/warp MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd 9 9/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 6 8/pause 400/                    /end

Changes.LogName: Sondra and Sam Pick the Music

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16192002/f MadDog.Hashtag: Saloon1/-1000 -1000/farmer 16 20 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 7 18 1 Sam 33 18 0 Emily 17 18 2 Shane 21 18 2 Marnie 9 22 1 Lewis 12 21 3 Willy 16 22 3 Gus 11 18 2/addConversationTopic SondraSaloonJukebox 10/skippable/animate Willy false true 750 28 29 30 31/animate Shane false true 750 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/animate Gus false true 750 18 18 19 19 20 20 19 19/animate Lewis false true 750 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 22 23 23 23 23 23 22 22 22 23 23 23 23 23/animate Marnie false true 750 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 13 19/textAboveHead Gus "Go on and take a look!"/pause 600/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 32/advancedMove Sam false 0 1 -11 0 0 2 -10 0 0 -1 -6 0 0 -3 -3 0 3 10/advancedMove MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra false -6 0 4 10/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/speak Gus "You're welcome to check out the music selection, too, @. There's not *much* to select though, I'm afraid."/emote farmer 32/advancedMove farmer false 0 1 -4 0 0 -1 -6 0 0 -2 -4 0 4 10/pause 5000/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 56/pause 600/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Hello @ dear. Shall we see what music is available to us? What track should we listen to, Banjo Bop, O'er the Valley, or Music Box Memory? "/quickQuestion #Let's hear Banjo Bop?#O'er the Valley has potential.#I hope Music Box Memory isn't sad.(break)playMusic CloudCountry\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh, that's rather quaint."\emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 32 true\emote farmer 32 true\emote Marnie 32 true\emote Shane 36(break)playMusic MainTheme\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "This is lovely, isn't it?$1"\emote farmer 32 true\emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 32 true\emote Lewis 32 true\emote Willy 24(break)playMusic grandpas_theme\speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh... dear, not quite upbeat, is it?"\emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 60 true\emote farmer 60 true\emote Willy 60 true\emote Marnie 60 true\emote Lewis 60 true\emote Shane 60 true\emote Gus 60\pause 500\emote farmer 28 true\emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 28\pause 600\textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Our apologies, everyone."/pause 500/playMusic Saloon1/pause 1000/speak Sam "You can try all you want, Mrs. Sondra, but the choices aren't that great."/pause 400/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 8 true/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Hello Sam! It's lovely to see you. Now, as I recall, *you* write music. Why haven't we expanded the jukebox selection to include your work?$3"/jump Sam/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 400/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Sam "Oh - well, I'm not that good.$4"/emote Sam 60/pause 400/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 16 true/emote farmer 16/pause 500/textAboveHead Sam "You two..."/pause 600/speak Sam "Besides, all I have is tapes - the jukebox won't play casettes.$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh, there we go, Sam! You should record a demo album!$3"/pause 400/jump Sam/emote Sam 16/pause 500/speak Sam "WHAT?$8"/emote farmer 8/speak Sam "We're not ready to record anything! And we've never had a gig outside of town yet, so no one would want our demo.$8"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 400/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Then all the more reason to record a demo!#3#$b#Sam, having a demo record that plays here where tourists might stop by is a great way to get exposure.$1#$b#And maybe they'll even request a copy!$3"/pause 600/textAboveHead Sam "*gulp*"/pause 600/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "What do you think, @?"/quickQuestion #I'd listen to your demo, Sam.#If people don't like it, there's still other albums in the jukebox.(break)speak Sam "You would!?$8"\emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 56(break)speak Sam "As long as they don't do that when I'm here.$2"\textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "That wouldn't happen, Sam!"/pause 500/speak Sam "You're forgetting a big part of all this, @, Mrs. Sondra...$2#$b#Traveling to a recording studio and recording an album costs money!$8"/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 28 true/emote Sam 28 true/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "There's a solution for that, I just know it!$11#$b#Let me think up some options and we'll reconvene, alright?$1"/quickQuestion #I'm happy to help if I can!#Better keep practicing in the meantime, Sam.(break)emote Sam 28(break)emote Sam 28/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Sondra's an accountant, she can probably figure out all kinds of ways for Sam to make recording money, right?"/stopAdvancedMoves/end

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16192003/e MadDog.BearFam: none/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 6 11 0/addConversationTopic SondraLastSong 10/skippable/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 13 28/pause 500/warp farmer 19 32/playSound doorClose/pause 200/playSound toyPiano/pause 50/playSound miniharp_note/pause 50/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh drat! That's not quite how it's meant to start, now is it?$5"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/advancedMove farmer false 0 -1 -6 0 0 -6 4 10/pause 2000/viewport move -2 -3 4000/playSound toyPiano/pause 50/playSound toyPiano/pause 50/playSound toyPiano/pause 50/playSound miniharp_note/pause 50/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh, darn it all! That's not right, either!$5"/pause 400/emote farmer 8/pause 400/advancedMove farmer false 0 -5 -1 0 0 -2 4 10/pause 3000/playSound toyPiano/pause 50/playSound miniharp_note/pause 50/playSound miniharp_note/pause 500/emote farmer 8/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Why am I even bothering? It will never sound right.$2"/doAction 12 17/playSound doorClose/pause 200/advancedMove farmer false 0 -8 -3 0 3 10/pause 3000/emote farmer 8/pause 400/jump MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra/faceDirection MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 1/emote farmer 40/pause 200/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Hello dear friend @! Let me just turn this thing off; no need to hear anymore of that cacophony."/quickQuestion #I didn't know you played music yourself.#Good thing you're an accountant and not a musician.(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh, my husband Wulf was the musician!$4#$b#I... tried to learn but it's simply not something that comes naturally to me.$2"(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh, my husband Wulf was the musician!$4#$b#I... tried to learn but it's simply not something that comes naturally to me.$2"/playMusic MadDog.HashtagBearFam_SondraTheme/pause 400/emote farmer 8/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "That was one of his songs, actually... the last song he ever wrote for me.$2"/pause 400/emote farmer 60/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "I don't mind talking about him."/emote farmer 8/pause 300/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh I've never heard it - he wouldn't let anyone listen while he was writing new songs, and after he passed, I could hardly go around asking people to play it."/quickQuestion #Why not? I'm sure others would like to hear it.#I'd help but I can't carry a tune even in a bucket.(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "But other musicians have their own music, I'm sure. I could never impose.$8"(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "We're two peas in a pod, dear @! As you can tell, neither can I.$10"\emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 32\faceDirection farmer 2\animate farmer false true 100 102 103\pause 1000\stopAnimation farmer\pause 50\faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "But, enough of that. Would you care for some tea? "/pause 400/emote farmer 32 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 32/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Despite her grief, Sondra still loves music. You hope she'll be able to hear Wulf's song someday..."/stopAdvancedMoves/end

Emily "I can walk you home, Sondra!"/pause 400/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Thank you, Emily dear, but I'm sure you've got your shift coming up.$2"/pause 400/emote Marnie 28 true/emote Caroline 28 true/emote Jodi 28/pause 500/speak Harvey "Well, I'll sit with you until then.$3#$b#I know you can be a bit prideful, Mrs. Sondra, but I can't have you trying to walk home alone in your poor state of health.$3"/pause 600/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "...$7"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Sondra seemed very sad about her condition. Maybe you can try visiting her later to cheer her up?"/stopAdvancedMoves/end

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16192005/e MadDog.BearFam: desolate/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 5 26 2 Sam 7 27 0 Sebastian 4 28 0/addConversationTopic CheeringUpMissSondra 10/skippable/showFrame MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 38/positionOffset MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 0 11/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 8 28/pause 200/speak Sam "I'm really glad you're on the mend, Mrs. Sondra.$3"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Mom really had me worried when she came home frantic after you collapsed.$2"/textAboveHead Sam "Good thing Harvey moved fast."/pause 200/textAboveHead Sebastian "Maru would've been faster."/emote Sam 28/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "I do appreciate you two taking the time to visit. I apologize for not being a very good hostess.$2"/pause 400/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/warp farmer 19 32/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/advancedMove farmer false 0 -1 -6 0 0 -3 -8 0 0 1 4 10/pause 400/speak Sam "We came to visit you, not be hosted, it's okay!"/pause 200/textAboveHead Sebastian "Well, there was something..."/emote Sam 28/pause 400/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 8/emote farmer 8/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Good to see you again, dear."/pause 500/speak Sam "Well, I'd normally save something like this for when you're feeling better..."/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Spit it out already, jeez.#$b#We still had a jam session even though you weren't able to come by."/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh, by all means! I'd hate to stifle your creative efforts just because of my old age -$2"/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/pause 200/textAboveHead Sam "You're not old!"/textAboveHead Sebastian "You're only fifty, right?"/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Sam "Practice is going better than ever thanks your support, you know.#$b#But we came up with a GREAT song. Like, I kind of can't believe we wrote it.$8"/pause 200/textAboveHead Sebastian "Well, I can."/pause 500/jump farmer/emote farmer 8/pause 400/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "That's so wonderful!$1#$b#I'm very proud of you, making such progress with your band."/emote Sam 32 true/emote Sebastian 32/pause 400/speak Sam "Well, I brought my guitar... So I'll play it for you and you can tell us what you think!$1#$b#Hey, @, you'll listen too, right?"/quickQuestion #Sure, I've got nothing better to do with my time.#You bet! Rock our socks off.(break)textAboveHead Sam "That's not a no at least."\textAboveHead Sebastian "Not an enthusiastic yes, either."(break)textAboveHead Sebastian "Keep your socks on, farmer."\textAboveHead Sam "Didn't bring my amp but I'll try."/faceDirection Sam 2/animate Sam false true 750 52 52 52 53 53 53 52 52 52 52/playMusic sampractice/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 56 true/emote Sebastian 56 true/emote Sam 56 true/emote farmer 56/showFrame MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 36/pause 5000/stopAnimation Sam 8/playMusic jaunty/speak Sam "So...what did you think?"/quickQuestion #Definitely keep practicing.#You've improved a lot!#That has potential.(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh that practice is paying off quite a bit! Wonderful work!$3"(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "And to think you were so shy before when you had this talent within you this entire time!$3"(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Astounding work! You're only going up from here!$3"/pause 500/emote Sam 32 true/emote Sebastian 32/pause 500/speak Sam "I'm glad you enjoyed it!"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "I loved it! You know what this means, don't you?"/emote Sam 8 true/emote Sebastian 8 true/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "You can record a demo album!$1#$b#With this and the other songs you've been working on, I think the band has a great selection to entice listeners!$3"/jump Sebastian/jump Sam/emote Sam 16 true/emote Sebastian 16/pause 500/textAboveHead Sam "I don't know if we ARE ready..."/pause 500/textAboveHead Sebastian "And it costs money..."/pause 400/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Well, with all this rest time on my hands, I can brainstorm a solution. Leave it to me!"/emote Sam 32 true/emote Sebastian 32 true/emote farmer 32 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 32/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "It looks like Sam and Sebastian were able to cheer up Sondra after her health scare. You can't wait to see what she comes up with for the band!"/stopAdvancedMoves/end

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16192006/e MadDog.BearFam: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer 29 11 2 Sam 23 13 1 Abigail 27 11 2 Sebastian 29 13 3 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 25 11 2/addConversationTopic SondraFundraiser 15/skippable/showFrame MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 36/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 28 14/textAboveHead Sam "Oh come on!"/pause 600/textAboveHead Sebastian "Like taking candy from a baby."/pause 500/animate Abigail false true 300 28 29/pause 2100/stopAnimation Abigail 0/emote farmer 32/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 32/pause 500/speak Sam "I think the poolsticks here are weighted different.$5"/pause 200/textAboveHead Sebastian "Excuses."/pause 300/speak Abigail "You're just bad at pool."/pause 300/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Rosa keeps the Inn in lovely shape, Sam, but you're welcome to suggest otherwise to her.$10"/jump Sam/speak Sam "Oh no no no, maybe Welwick read my fortune wrong this morning.$8"/pause 400/animate Abigail false true 300 28 29/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 2100/stopAnimation Abigail 0/stopAnimation farmer/textAboveHead Sebastian "That's still an excuse."/jump Sam/pause 500/speak Sam "*ANY*way...Mrs. Sondra, you mentioned you had an idea for us to raise funds?"/pause 200/textAboveHead Abigail "Nice change of subject."/textAboveHead Sebastian "*snicker*"/emote farmer 8/pause 600/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Ah, straight to business!$10#$b#Well, the other day as we were checking festival budgets, Lewis brought up how much he'd love it if we had a touch more tourism. Bring in a bit more funding, you see."/emote farmer 8 true/emote Sam 8 true/emote Abigail 8 true/emote Sebastian 8/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "And that made me think of the last music festival I attended back in Zuzu with Wulf."/emote farmer 8 true/emote Sam 8 true/emote Abigail 8 true/emote Sebastian 8/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "It was a battle of the bands!$1#$b#People paid for a ticket, businesses sponsored food, and bands battled for a prize.#$b#The funds were split between benefiting the neighborhood and rewarding the champion band!$3"/pause 400/textAboveHead Sam "...A battle of the ... bands?"/pause 500/textAboveHead Sebastian "So... we'd play..."/pause 500/textAboveHead Abigail "...Against OTHER bands?"/emote farmer 16/pause 500/{{MadDog.HashtagBearFam.BattleoftheBandSponsors}}/quickQuestion #I can supply some food.#I can supply some resources.(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh wonderful, I'll put up a special order"\addSpecialOrder MadDog.Bearfam.SondraBotBFood(break)speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh wonderful, I'll put up a special order!"\addSpecialOrder MadDog.Bearfam.SondraBotBMaterial/pause 500/speak Sam "Run... an ad?$8"/pause 200/textAboveHead Abigail "Uh oh. Sam?"/pause 400/speak Sebastian "No time to be afraid now, you're the face of the band."/pause 300/textAboveHead Sam "B-Battle..."/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 28 true/emote farmer 28 true/emote Abigail 28 true/emote Sebastian 28/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "This idea has a lot of promise! But what if the other bands somehow beat out Sam and the gang?"/stopAdvancedMoves/end

Entries.MadDog.BearFam.16192008/e MadDog.BearFam: Saloon1/-1000 -1000/farmer 22 19 1 Juliet? 32 17 1 Rosa 33 18 0 Sam 36 20 1 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 38 19 2 Abigail 40 19 2 Sebastian 42 20 3/addConversationTopic SondraGratitude 5/skippable/globalFadeToClear 100/viewport 39 19/advancedMove farmer false 12 0 0 -1 5 0 2 10/emote Rosa 12/pause 400/emote Juliet? 32/pause 500/textAboveHead Abigail "Yikes, that was a bad shot."/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh, dear, Sam..."/pause 500/emote Sam 60/pause 500/emote Sebastian 32/pause 500/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Hello!"/textAboveHead Sam "Hey, you made it!"/textAboveHead Sebastian "Yo."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Abigail "It was super nice of the Mayor to loan us the truck to get to Zuzu City."/emote Sam 28 true/emote Sebastian 40/pause 500/speak Sam "I mean, he didn't let *us* borrow the truck...$2"/speak Sebastian "Well, Pam *mostly* knew what she was doing.$2"/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "*haha*"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/quickQuestion #Wait, you guys had Pam drive you?#Wait, what did you go to Zuzu for again?(break)speak Sebastian "I could have driven us but Mayor Lewis wanted a trusted adult with us.$5"\emote Sam 28 true\emote Abigail 28 true\emote farmer 16(break)speak Abigail "Uhh, recording our demo CD, duh? C'mon @, the contest wasn't that long ago!"\emote Sam 60 true\emote Sebastian 60 true\emote farmer 16/pause 500/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 32/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "So, how have the recording sessions been? Pam's taken you to quite a few sessions now, right?$3"/emote farmer 8/emote Abigail 32 true/emote Sebastian 32/pause 500/speak Sam "Well, it's coming along. It was kind of... daunting, I guess is the best word, to be in a real professional studio with a real producer, though...$8"/textAboveHead MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Ah, I can imagine..."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/speak Abigail "The producer was super cool! She was like, a real rockstar, made records with all the greats!$1"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "And she had a lot of advice that I'd never heard before. The stuff that's probably industry secrets.$7"/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 32 true/emote farmer 32/speak Sam "Yeah and I really think we -"/speak Gus "Oh, sorry there, Willy. Sam's actually got the next play on the jukebox tonight."/speak Sam "...!$3"/playMusic MadDog.HashtagBearFam_SondraThemeSamVersion/emote Sam 16 true/emote Abigail 16 true/emote Sebastian 16/pause 1000/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 8 true/emote farmer 8/pause 500/quickQuestion #Huh? This is new on the jukebox!#Wait, isn't this the song from the Battle of the Bands?(break)speak Sam "Ahh, well... we've been kind of fibbing..."\speak Abigail "Our demo's completed!$1"\speak Sebastian "Gus got the fifth copy - the first three went to our parents..."(break)speak Sam "You mean the song that WON Battle of the Bands!$1"\speak Sebastian "It's the first track on the demo... Which we completed actually, heh.$1"\speak Abigail "And we gave Gus the fifth copy after we handed out the copies to our folks!$1"/emote farmer 16 true/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 16/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh my goodness! ...But surely you mean the fourth copy?"/faceDirection MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 3/advancedMove Sam false 0 -1 1 0 1 10/pause 800/positionOffset Sam 10 0/pause 300/positionOffset Sam -10 0/textAboveHead Abigail "Nope!"/textAboveHead Sebastian "Naw, we saved it."/speak Sam "That fourth copy is yours, Mrs. Sondra. We'd never have gotten this far without your encouragement... You're kind of like... an honorary member of the band."/advancedMove Sam false -1 0 0 1 1 10/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 16/pause 200/emote MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 20 true/emote farmer 20/pause 500/speak MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra "Oh my goodness, you three! I will treasure this record for the rest of my life.$4#$b#And thank you, for listening to a little old lady talk to you about music.$10"/textAboveHead Sam "You're our favorite little old lady!"/textAboveHead Abigail "You're not even that old!"/textAboveHead Sebastian "What else could we do?
